Class JaCaMoLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • jason.infra.centralised.BaseCentralisedMAS

  • public class JaCaMoLauncher
extends jason.infra.centralised.RunCentralisedMAS
    Runs MASProject using JaCaMo infrastructure. This class reads the mas2j project and create the corresponding environment, organisation, agents, ...
